results.title: Simvastatin Induces Apoptosis And Suppresses Hepatocellular Carcinoma Induced In Rats
results.text_hl: Apoptosis was assessed using immunohistochemistry (IHC) and quantitative PCR (qPCR). @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ was found to induce apoptosis successfully in @DISEASE_Carcinoma_Hepatocellular @DISEASE_MESH:D006528 @@@HCC@@@ and improve @<m>DISEASE_Liver_Cirrhosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008103 @@@liver fibrosis@@@, overall hepatic function, and necroinflammatory score.

citations.NLM: Elleithi YA, El-Gayar AM, Amin MN. Simvastatin Induces Apoptosis And Suppresses Hepatocellular Carcinoma Induced In Rats Appl Biochem Biotechnol. 2023 Mar;195(3):1656-1674. PMID: 36367620

results.title: Simvastatin is Efficacious in Treating Cirrhosis: A Meta-analysis.
results.text_hl: Here, we performed a meta-analysis to evaluate the clinical efficacy of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Liver_Cirrhosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008103 @@@liver cirrhosis@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

results.title: Successful treatment of lathosterolosis: A rare defect in cholesterol biosynthesis:A case report and review of literature
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ treatment resulted in lowering of plasma @CHEMICAL_lathosterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:C001521 @@@lathosterol@@@ levels, improvement in transaminitis, and @<m>DISEASE_Liver_Cirrhosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008103 @@@liver fibrosis@@@ grade, suggesting that children with this condition should be actively treated in order to prevent progression of @DISEASE_Liver_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D008107 @@@liver disease@@@.

citations.NLM: Yaplito-Lee J, Pai G, Hardikar W, Hong KM, Pitt J, Marum J, Amor DJ. Successful treatment of lathosterolosis: A rare defect in cholesterol biosynthesis:A case report and review of literature JIMD Rep. 2020 Nov;56(1):14-19. PMID: 33204591

results.title: Simvastatin and Rifaximin in Decompensated Cirrhosis: A Randomized Clinical Trial.
results.text_hl: Importance: There are no useful treatments to prevent the development of severe complications of @<m>DISEASE_Liver_Cirrhosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008103 @@@liver cirrhosis@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Rifaximin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000078262 @@@rifaximin@@@ have shown beneficial effects in @<m>DISEASE_Liver_Cirrhosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008103 @@@liver cirrhosis@@@.

results.title: Ultrasound-Mediated Biomimetic Microbubbles Effectively Reverse LSECs Capillarization and Exert Antiplatelet Therapy in Liver Fibrosis.
results.text_hl: This study demonstrates the strong therapeutic efficacy of the multifunctional MBs integrating @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Sim@@@ and PLT against @<m>DISEASE_Liver_Cirrhosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008103 @@@liver fibrosis@@@, which highlights a great potential for effectively managing this intractable chronic disease.

results.title: Combined quercetin and simvastatin attenuate hepatic fibrosis in rats by modulating SphK1/NLRP3 pathways.
results.text_hl: Combined @CHEMICAL_Quercetin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011794 @@@quercetin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ attenuate @<m>DISEASE_Liver_Cirrhosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008103 @@@hepatic fibrosis@@@ in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ by modulating @GENE_SPHK1 @GENE_170897 @@@SphK1@@@/@GENE_NLRP3 @GENE_287362 @@@NLRP3@@@ pathways.

results.title: Baseline Severity and Inflammation Would Influence the Effect of Simvastatin on Clinical Outcomes in Cirrhosis Patients.
results.text_hl: Finally, admissions for @<m>DISEASE_Liver_Cirrhosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008103 @@@cirrhosis complications@@@ decreased in CPc AEST versus CPc B/C (P = 0.017).

results.title: Protective effects of statins on the incidence of NAFLD-related decompensated cirrhosis in T2DM.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: A higher cumulative dose and specific types of statins, namely @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Fluvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077340 @@@fluvastatin@@@, reduced the risk of @<m>DISEASE_Liver_Cirrhosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008103 @@@DLC@@@ in patients with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2DM@@@.

citations.NLM: Wu SY, Chen WM, Chiang MF, Lo HC, Wu MS, Lee MC, Soong RS. Protective effects of statins on the incidence of NAFLD-related decompensated cirrhosis in T2DM. Liver Int. 2023 Jun 29;():. PMID: 37381761

results.title: Simvastatin Ameliorates Liver Fibrosis via Mediating Nitric Oxide Synthase in Rats with Non-Alcoholic Steatohepatitis-Related Liver Fibrosis
results.text_hl: We aimed to clarify the relationship between @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Liver_Cirrhosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008103 @@@liver fibrosis@@@ both in vivo and in vitro.
